quest.name: Ishgardian Justice
journal: Fray is ready to teach you. You need only ask.

Fray speaks to you of the first dark knight─a goodly knight who sacrificed all in order to bring an untouchable man to justice. Too many fear the consequences such actions will bring, and innocents suffer for our indecision, shehe says. Consider herhis words as you seek out the source of the earlier scream.

You come upon an old woman, who beseeches you to save her granddaughter─a spirited young woman who was seized by Temple Knights after an altercation. It soon becomes clear that she is not the first girl to be taken under such circumstances, and that the Temple Knights' intentions are anything but honorable. Fray observes that the girl might survive the ordeal─but shehe knows full well that you would rather punish the knights for their crimes. The decision is made. Make your plans with Fray.

Fray surmises that the Temple Knights will take the girl to the Supreme Sacred Tribunal of Halonic Inquisitory Doctrine. SheHe bids you follow herhim to the Pillars and discuss your next course of action there.

Fear, pain, rage─these dark emotions make for a potent fuel, Fray tells you. Should things turn violent, you may need to draw upon this darkness to strike down your enemies. Prepare for the worst and search the Pillars for the Temple Knights.

Oh, how they screamed when you came for them. How their cries of anger turned to fear! How you bathed in the fires of your hatred to bring them to justice. Fray's words were music in your ears as they echoed in the Tribunal, as you promised them a reckoning should they dare speak of this day again...

As you tend to the girl afterwards, you ask if she recalls who it was that screamed your name when she was taken. She tells you, however, that only her grandmother cried out. Thanking you a final time, she hurries back towards the Brume, leaving you alone with Fray.

“You have done well,” Fray tells you. Far better than shehe could have hoped. But the risks will only increase as you walk further along the path. “Trust in me,” shehe asks, and you want to. You know that you need to...and that, when the time is right, shehe will be waiting for you where you first met.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Fray upon reaching level 35.
objectives: Speak with Fray in the Pillars.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Well, well, don't you look the part. Ready to harness the darkness within to set the wrong things right.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Now, bear in mind that while the darkness gives you strength, that strength comes at cost. That is but one sacrifice, though─and justice demands many.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Say a man─a venerable, untouchable man─harms a child in unspeakable ways. He strides through the Hoplon, secure in the knowledge that he is beyond punishment. But for one who cuts down that vile beast as he flaunts his freedom, who knows how many others will suffer?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Such was the dilemma faced by a goodly knight long ago. He knew that he would be stripped of his titles and denounced for the deed.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The threshold we refuse to cross is a line we draw for ourselves. We fear the consequences, and people suffer for our indecision.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Everyone who held that crystal came to conquer that fear, and became who they wanted to be. That knight was the first. Will you be the next?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Think on that while we look into the commotion down below.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Here we are. Go and ask her what's wrong.

dialogue.name: GRANDMOTHER02054
dialogue.text: Please, I don't know what to do! It's...it's my granddaughter...

dialogue.name: GRANDMOTHER02054
dialogue.text: I didn't see him standing there─and I know that's no excuse, I should've been more careful.

dialogue.name: GRANDMOTHER02054
dialogue.text: But my granddaughter, she started yelling at the Temple Knight─and I tried to stop her, I did! But then he said she had to come with him, and...and if I could just tell him how sorry I am, maybe...maybe he would...

dialogue.name: POOR02054
dialogue.text: (-Weary Young Man-)...He'd take you too is what he'd do.

dialogue.name: POOR02054
dialogue.text: (-Weary Young Man-)Even if you went and begged the blue bastard to intervene, it'd be too late by then.

dialogue.name: POOR02054
dialogue.text: (-Weary Young Man-)...Ain't the first time they've taken a girl her age. If she doesn't fight back, they might let her go after...

dialogue.name: GRANDMOTHER02054
dialogue.text: No, no! There has to be another way!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Ah, Ishgardian justice.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: They might spare the girl, you know. Leave her with a few scars and a lifelong lesson.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Or we could beat every last one of them to within an ilm of their lives and rescue the girl. You'd like that, wouldn't you?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I knew you would.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Everything is going to be all right, madam. When I'm through with those knights, they will not dare trouble you ever again.

dialogue.name: GRANDMOTHER02054
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you, thank you!

dialogue.name: GRANDMOTHER02054
dialogue.text: Please...please bring her back to me!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Assuming they didn't just drag her into an alley, they've taken her to either the Congregation or the Tribunal.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The honorable Ser Aymeric wouldn't suffer such reprehensible behavior under his roof. The inquisition, on the other hand...well.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: So that leaves the Tribunal.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: If the girl is still alive, I imagine they'll make all manner of threats. “Come any closer and she dies,” and so forth. If so, we'll need to make something perfectly clear to them...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: We're not here for her; we're here for you.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Once they understand she means nothing to us, they'll attack us or flee. I don't know about you, but I'm eager to find out which.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have learned all dark knight actions and traits to level 30. Detailed descriptions can be viewed in the Actions & Traits window, accessed under Character in the main menu.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Just the one sword between the two of us, I'm afraid. You keep it─I daresay it fits rather snugly in your hands.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But don't worry about me─I'll do my part to keep you on your feet.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Now, should things turn violent─as I expect they shall─you may need to tap into your darkside to survive.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: It's not unlike drawing upon your own aether to weave magic.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Fear, pain, rage─that which lies in the deepest depths of our soul makes for a potent fuel.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But be warned: burn too much too quickly, and you risk being consumed.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Do not worry, Forename. The first step over the threshold is always the hardest.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Ah, yes. I should've known you'd do that.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Right, then. Let's find the girl.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Search the area between here and the Tribunal for the knights. I'll be right behind you.

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: Wh-Who are you? Another highborn arse!?

dialogue.name: CAVALRYLEADER02054
dialogue.text: Dammit, girl! You're only making it worse for yourself!

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: The hells with you! I've done nothing wrong!

dialogue.name: CAVALRYLEADER02054
dialogue.text: <sigh> Why are the pretty ones always so daft...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: If I had a gil for every time I had to kill an unrepentant bastard like you...

dialogue.name: CAVALRYLEADER02054
dialogue.text: Wh-What the...? Are you threatening a Temple Knight?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Oh, you're very clever. Yes, I am. Now let her go.

dialogue.name: CAVALRYLEADER02054
dialogue.text: I...I... Enough of this!

dialogue.name: CAVALRYLEADER02054
dialogue.text: With me, girl─now! One more word of protest and I'll toss your grandmother in a cell to rot!

dialogue.name: CAVALRYLEADER02054
dialogue.text: You three─seize this imbecile!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Well done, hero. I think the fair maiden wants to have a word.

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: I don't know what to say, misssir! Thank you, thank you!

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: I...I got a little carried away earlier. It's just that when I saw how they were treating my grandmother, I had to say something, and─

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: ...What? No one screamed your name. My grandmother called out, just the once, but that was it...

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, I should hurry back...

dialogue.name: DAUGHTER02054
dialogue.text: I suppose I ought to say that I'm sorry for what I did...but I'm not. Those knights had it coming. Halone bless you for what you did.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Feels good, doesn't it? Strange, maybe─but a good strange, I'll wager.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You tapped into something primal. A power nestled within you, yearning to be free.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: As your understanding of this power grows, so too will your skill as a dark knight.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You have done well─far better than I could have hoped, in fact. But there is still so much more to learn─so much further to go.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I won't lie to you, Forename. The risks will only increase. So if you want to keep going, you have to trust in me. Can you do that?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I can.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I don't know...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Good. That's a promise.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Circumstances being what they are, it might be best if we parted ways for a while. Think of it as an opportunity to hone your skills in my absence.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But don't worry─we will meet again. When the time is right, I'll be waiting where we first met.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: It's only natural to have doubts. I appreciate your honesty.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Give some thought to what I said. When you are ready, come and find me. I'll be waiting where we first met.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next dark knight quest will be available from Fray upon reaching level 35.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The requirements for undertaking subsequent quests can be reviewed in your journal.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: No! It will not end here!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Surrender or die!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Funny─I was about to say the same thing!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Show them no mercy, Forename!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Bring...bring everyone! SheHe's gone mad!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Reinforcements, eh? Looks like we'll have to even the odds.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Search your soul for the darkness. We need but a sliver... Yes...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Do you see, Forename? The flames beckon.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Immerse yourself in the flames and ignite the darkness within.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Just so. As it burns hotter, so too does your strength swell.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: But drink not too deep, lest the flames consume you...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Draw upon your darkside and drive your foes before you!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: All this for a baseborn bitch!? Do you know what you're doing!?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Aye, I do! I'm killing you and anyone else who gets in my way!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: The next knight who bears steel, I'm not only going to kill him, but I'm going to kill his wife, his friends, and burn his godsdamned house down!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Those of you who yet live, remember this horror! And know that should you speak of it, it shall be visited upon you again a hundredfold!
